entries.title: Morning Reflections
entries.summary: Started my day with a walk and meditation. Felt calm and focused.

entries.title: Busy Study Day
entries.summary: Had three classes and a project meeting. Stayed organized and motivated.

entries.title: Weekend Fun
entries.summary: Spent time with family in Georgia.

entries.title: Gym Time
entries.summary: Worked out with a friend after a long time.

entries.title: Family Time
entries.summary: Had dinner with family after a while.

entries.title: Rainy Weather
entries.summary: Rainy day. Spent the evening with someone I like.

entries.title: Midterm Stress
entries.summary: Studying for midterms, math was tough!

entries.title: Self-Care Sunday
entries.summary: Did a face mask, listened to music, and journaled about my goals.
